mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.name AS "name", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.arrival_sta AS "arrivalSta", a.flight_num AS "flightNum", a.seat_num AS "seatNum", a.province AS "province", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.sf_id AS "sfId", a.create_date AS "createDate"

a.id AS "id", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.name AS "name", a.begin_date AS "beginDate", a.arrival_sta AS "arrivalSta", a.flight_num AS "flightNum", a.seat_num AS "seatNum", a.province AS "province", a.lx_tel AS "lxTel", a.of_shizhou AS "ofShizhou", a.of_quxian AS "ofQuxian", a.resp_area AS "respArea", a.phone AS "phone", a.habitation AS "habitation", a.tel_station AS "telStation", a.sf_id AS "sfId", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_flight( id, id_number, name, begin_date, arrival_sta, flight_num, seat_num, province, lx_tel, of_shizhou, of_quxian, resp_area, phone, habitation, tel_station, sf_id, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{idNumber}, #{name}, #{beginDate}, #{arrivalSta}, #{flightNum}, #{seatNum}, #{province}, #{lxTel}, #{ofShizhou}, #{ofQuxian}, #{respArea}, #{phone}, #{habitation}, #{telStation}, #{sfId}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE p_flight SET id_number = #{idNumber}, name = #{name}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, arrival_sta = #{arrivalSta}, flight_num = #{flightNum}, seat_num = #{seatNum}, province = #{province}, lx_tel = #{lxTel}, of_shizhou = #{ofShizhou}, of_quxian = #{ofQuxian}, resp_area = #{respArea}, phone = #{phone}, habitation = #{habitation}, tel_station = #{telStation}, sf_id = #{sfId} WHERE id = #{id}
